sub_title: Data-Driven Product Manager || Research and Analysis || Hypothesis Testing || Agile Team Management
summary:
I am looking for new opportunities in a product company that cares about its users, using analytics and research as key tools to get things done.

I have 4+ years of experience in product development and marketing. My approach to product development is always based on user needs.

I built from scratch, brought it to market, and led it to market fit and profit through user research, data analysis, and prototyping.

I have experience in B2B and B2C product development for both web and mobile.

Core industries: 
Marketplaces, Classified, Gaming, Insurance & Finance, Quick Trade, Logistics, Marketing.

Core expertise:
* Agile Project Management
* Data analysis (GA/GTM, Amplitude, Hotjar, SQL, Python) 
* User Research (CusDev) 
* A/B Tests
* People management (Scrum)
* Products/new feature launches
* Marketing skills

certifications.name: Capstone: Retrieving, Processing, and Visualizing Data with Python
Using Python to Access Web Data
Data-driven product management simulator.  Product Manager profession

profile_positions.description:
Web, B2B SaaS, Marketplace 

 • When starting a startup from scratch, I began with user and market research to determine, does the market need this product.

• After conducting over 100 in-depth interviews with potential users and screening over a thousand respondents in surveys, I received feedback from users that substantiated the market need for the product.

• I made a Business Canvas with all the key success metrics of our product and MVP, which, after tests, further confirmed the market demand for the product.

• Together with the marketing manager, I developed a go-to-market strategy that allowed us to grow the product to 100.000 users worldwide in 12 months without major investment in advertising.

• Through User & UX research and data analysis, I got ideas on how to improve the product and prioritized the backlog using the value/cost methodology. I then validated them with A/B tests, and depending on the results, my team and I made decisions to implement the feature. This approach allowed us to fully increase user activation by 500%, increase 30-day retention by 7%, and reduce the cost of user acquisition by an average of 300%.

•  Implemented a Scrum/Agile process for a team of 10 people (eight engineers, one designer and one QA which allowed us to create an accurate Roadmap for the future. It also increased the development team's involvement in the business strategy and got QA and designers involved in the overall process.

• Communicated with stakeholders and partners to understand deeper their needs, created a roadmap and managed the development team to implement functionality in a timely manner.
Invented and implemented a monetization system into the product. After many trials, I found a monetization system that benefits us and pays off the product. Because of this, we have been able to make our marketing more aggressive, which allows us to grow faster.
profile_positions.title: Senior Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
Web, B2B SaaS, Insurance

• Accelerated API integrations with email, financial, insurance, banking, and advertising companies by researching and describing such integrations in detail for the development team in Confluence and in User Stories in Jira.

• Prioritized development tasks and a product roadmap by gathering information from stakeholders and partners

• Worked closely with the development, design, and management team to develop feature requirements, describe tasks for developers in Jira and Confluence, and maintain Scrum processes

• I tested the functionality with Swagger, API testing, and manual testing to make sure it meets the Business requirements.
profile_positions.title: Middle Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Web/Mobile App, B2C, Gaming

• Created a process for collecting user feedback in Discord, and social networks through questionnaires and in-depth interviews, which cumulatively increased product revenue by 300% through feedback-based changes

• Diversified the monetization strategy. I figured out that expanding the payment options for users could bring at least a 50% increase in paying customers. Since it was difficult to implement, I created a prototype concept and we tested it. The result exceeded our expectations
and increased the number of paying users by 75%.

• Developed an onboarding system with rewards and achievement incentives that increased 30-day user retention from 1% to 14% and increased conversion of free users to paying users by 40%.

• Constantly updated backlog with hypotheses found through data analysis GA, GTM, Hotjar)

• Successfully implemented Agile/Scrum processes for the team, improving documentation, communication, and understanding of team goals among the team
profile_positions.title: Product Manager
